Text: to be completely honest, i don't see why you don't just leave it as mp4 lol

I downloaded this and some how it downloaded Antivir Pro Virus which raped my computer for a couple of hours after 4 hours of frustrating ways of trying to delete it I finally got rid of it.

Just saying this happened to me, not sure it'll happen to others that download this torrent but yeah.
sorry your system had problems, but the files within themselves do not have viruses/spyware, its possible you connected to people with probs...
100% clean files, if there is problems its from the seeders, not the uploader
I've downloaded every episode he's uploaded so far and not a problem. If you downloaded a virus through one of the seeders I definitely suggest better virus protection.
